itrelated.division: Information and Communications Technology Group – Application Management Division
Information and Communications Technology Group – Application Management Division
duties: Provide support in the re-development and design of GOCC Monitoring System (GMS) and GOCC Leadership Management System (GLMS) modules of the Integrated Corporate Reporting System (ICRS) Web applications/modules based on defined specifications;
Provide support in the enhancement of GCG internal applications/modules based on defined specifications;
Assist in the integration of software component or modules into a fully functional software system;
Assist in ensuring that the developed program meets all requirements of quality, security, modifiability, and extensibility;
Assist in testing code periodically to ensure the desirable results and perform debugging when necessary;
Provide support in preparing required documentations, including both program-level and user-level documentation;
Perform other functions as may be assigned from time to time by the Application Management Division (AMD) Chief.
Develop a new SaaS (Software as a Service) application using latest technology and new software development methodology;
Ensure that the developed application meets all the requirements of quality, security, modifiability, and extensibility;
Maintain existing applications.
Support users in application modules based on company-standards;
Provide support to customers by resolving concerns and inquiries;
Accurately provide real time support;
Ensure adherence to quality standards.
Responsible for teaching of both core and elective subjects in the field specialization as allocated by the Head of the Program offered by the University;
Also, conduct laboratory courses, tutorials and seminars of the subject assigned in an effective manner, so as to improve the practical knowledge of the student;
Lastly, conduct the core/elective subject as project based / experimental / activity-based learning.
Responsible for teaching basic to intermediate knowledge on Microsoft Office Applications (e.g. Word, PowerPoint, Excel, etc.);
Also, responsible for teaching basic to intermediate knowledge on Website Designing particularly in the usage of Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).
Ensure interviews conducted are done with the highest level of quality by properly administering each survey without falsification of data and bias;
Perform survey research by using proper interviewing techniques and adhering to strict methodologies and guidelines;
Record respondent’s answers with 100% accuracy, including typing respondent’s verbal answers in verbatim to survey questions and meet assigned quota for survey collection;
Promote and provide extraordinary guest service for both internal and external guests; answer questions, offer information, and help in a courteous manner.

otherjob.position: Seasonal Sales and Customer Service Representative
duties: Responsible for driving sales and achieving sales goals across assigned product categories;
Identify, qualify, prepare, and execute effective sales strategies that maintain the existing base of business and support the close of competitive and revenue growth opportunities;
Master all products and applications by demonstrating ongoing competency;
Maintain and increase sales volume within assigned accounts and territory;
Assist customers with back-orders and other related service issues;
Answers incoming phone calls and inquiries. Routes calls and messages within the management system to appropriate staff;
Resolve customer complaints in accordance with Company Policy and advises sales management promptly of any situation beyond the Sales Representative’s Authority.
